title: Bus Route
description:
This API is use to get the info for each bus lines including the bus line code, total distance, total trip and etc.

Endpoint description: Get list of bus line(s) filter by bus_vendor_id or name

method.desc: Get all bus line related data
Get bus line data by route code
Get bus line data by vendor id

response.name: name
response.desc: The route number for the particular bus route

response.name: bus_vendor_id
response.desc: The id for the particular bus vendor/operator. This data is correlate with the bus vendor data. You can check all bus operator data here

response.name: distance
response.desc: The total distance of the bus route in Kilometer. This value is predetermined during the insertion of the bus line.

response.name: special_route
response.desc: This is a special tag if the bus line considered as special route. Special route is when a particular route has a deviation from normal route at certain particular time. For normal user, you may not have any use for this option.

response.name: total_trip
response.desc: A total of trip of that route in a day  (may not accurate if route is a special route)

response.name: active
response.desc: Indicator whether the route is currently be use PAJ

title: Route GeoJson
description: GeoJSON is an open standard format designed for representing simple geographical features, along with their non-spatial attributes. PAJ use geojson as geographical to draw route, polygon and point coordinate with our system. 3rd party user can use this geojson data to retreive routes data use by BMJ.

method.desc: Get all geojson route data
Get particular geojson by route name

response.name: name
response.desc: Name of the search route

response.name: geojson
response.desc: GeoJSON data of the route. You may need to parse this data into readable form of valid GeoJSON before you can use it to draw a polyline into your map plugin of choices

title: Route Schedule
description:
This API is use to get the info for each bus lines including the bus line code, total distance, total trip and etc.

Endpoint description: Get list of bus line(s) filter by bus_vendor_id or name

method.desc: Get all trip data of all BMJ route
Get a trip data of a BMJ route by route name

response.name: route
response.desc: Name of the route

response.name: trip
response.desc: The trip data for the route by day of the week and its schedule

response.name: dayofweek
response.desc: The day of the week for the route. Can be from sunday to saturday

response.name: schedule
response.desc: The general start trip data the bus need to depart from the designation waiting station

title: Operator List
description: List of all operator working directly under

method.desc: Get all operators working under PAJ

response.name: id
response.desc: Id for each route

response.name: bus_vendor_id
response.desc: The id for the particular bus vendor/operator. This data is correlate with the bus vendor data. You can check all bus operator data here

response.name: code
response.desc: The route number for the particular bus route

response.name: distance
response.desc: The total distance of the bus route in Kilometer. This value is predetermined during the insertion of the bus line.

response.name: km_price
response.desc: The price that need to be paid to the vendor in Ringgit Malaysia per each kilometer

response.name: special_line
response.desc: This is a special tag if the bus line considered as special line. Special line is when a particular route has a deviation from normal route at certain particular time. For normal user, you may not have any use for this option.

response.name: total_trip
response.desc: A total of trip of that route in a day  (may not accurate if route is a special route)

title: Bus Live Data
description:
This API is use to get the info for each bus lines including the bus line code, total distance, total trip and etc.

Endpoint description: Get list of bus line(s) filter by bus_vendor_id or name

method.desc: Get all live bus data
Get particular live bus data with requested bus plate. Eg: JTV6100, JJU2633
Get all live bus data by operator name. Need to be in all capatilize word. Eg: MAYANG SARI, HANDAL INDAH
Get all live bus data by route name. Eg: BP001, P101

response.name: id
response.desc: Id for each route

response.name: bus_vendor_id
response.desc: The id for the particular bus vendor/operator. This data is correlate with the bus vendor data. You can check all bus operator data here

response.name: code
response.desc: The route number for the particular bus route

response.name: distance
response.desc: The total distance of the bus route in Kilometer. This value is predetermined during the insertion of the bus line.

response.name: km_price
response.desc: The price that need to be paid to the vendor in Ringgit Malaysia per each kilometer

response.name: special_line
response.desc: This is a special tag if the bus line considered as special line. Special line is when a particular route has a deviation from normal route at certain particular time. For normal user, you may not have any use for this option.

response.name: total_trip
response.desc: A total of trip of that route in a day  (may not accurate if route is a special route)

Get all bus stops filter by type of the stop. Can be Terminal, Pole and Terminal
